message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thanks for the offer, but $180 is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $100 for it. Let me know if you're open to that.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $160.
